questions.stem_text: A pen marked at $50 is sold at a 20% discount. Find the selling price.
questions.answer_explanation: The selling price is calculated by applying a 20% discount to the marked price of $50. 20% of $50 is $10, so the selling price is $50 - $10 = $40.

formulas.text: Selling Price = Marked Price - (Discount Percentage × Marked Price)
formulas.description: Formula to calculate selling price after discount
